ngoList.title: JAN SHIKSHAN SANSTHAN ADRI
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: JSS ADRI was setup in April 2000 under the Central scheme of NLMA, Department of School Education and Literacy, Ministry of HRD, Government of India. JSS, since then has been providing Vocational and Skill Development training and Life enrichment education to Non-literates, Neo-literates and socio-economically deprived sections of the society with special focus on women, SC/ST, OBC and Minority community in the rural areas and urban slums of Patna district with a view to empowering them for entrepreneurship development, self-employment and employment. JSS ADRI on a regular basis has formulated and organised 15 vocational courses for six to one months duration. During the last about one and half decade JSS ADRI has imparted training to nearly 2000 participants every year in different trades of their liking. On an average the coverage of beneficiaries has been â€” Women 85-90 %, OBC 40-50 %, SC/ST 18-24 % and Minorities Community 15-20 % Over the years, however, with the growing needs of the target groups, new roles have been assigned to the Institute. JSS ADRI has been playing its designated roles and conducting programmes and activities in accordance with the guidelines provided by DAI, NLMA from time to time. JSS ADRI is conducting programmes under various schemes. which, inter-alia include â€” (a) imparting skill development and livelihood promotion based training in the villages adopted by 6 Members of Parliament under Saansad Adarsh Gram Yojana (SAGY), (b) mobilization of beneficiaries under Prime Minister Suraksha Bima Yojana (PMSBY), (c) orientation of neo-literates for the certificate course of National Institute of Open Schooling, and (d) skill development courses for promoting self-employment, based on curriculum, developed by the Department of Adult Education.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: JSS, Aurangabad, Bihar sanctioned in the last phase of 2006-07. At the time of starting it faced very ups and downs. No one was aware about the scheme. The situation changed slowly and now its path of progress is laudable today. Each and every class of society specially the unprivileged class are now acquainted with its functioning and availing the opportunity for their need based skill development. Instead of being considered as a red-corridor in context of national map, it has achieved remark.

Jan Shikshan Sansthan, do various activities within its framework awaring the society about environment, health national importance etc. In addition to it the innovative programmes launched by the Govt. is also canvassed among beneficiaries and local people. The impact of which is laudable as mass of the people get engaged in the movement and it take a campaing mode. Thought not remaining in the first phase as being a naxal belt for Pradhan Mantri, Jan Dhan Yojana, an awareness campaing has show

In addition to impart need base skill in various trades to literate, neo-literate, rudimentary level education people for their life enrichment. JSS, Aurangabad, Bihar avail the opportunity to aware the people about the innovative programmes of Govt. of India for their sake. In the financial year 2014-15, Pradhan Mantri Jan Dhan Yojana shown a big boost. The same situation happened with Swachh Bharat Abhiyan. In contnuation of these programmes, Jan Shikshan Sansthan, Aurangabad, Bihar.

Imparting basic skills need based to its beneficiaries i.e non-literate, neo-literate, rudimentary level educated people and un-employed youths with life enrichment education, LEE in the completely troubled area of red corridor of the country. It also aware the people and local mass about the new and latest programmes and schemes of Govt. of India for their welfare.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Jan Shikshan Sansthan, Gaya & its Special Achievements The Jan Shikshan Sansthan, Gaya (Institute of Peopleâ€™s Education) formerly known as Shramik Vidyapeeth, Gaya is a polyvalent or multi-faceted adult education programme sponsored by Ministry of Human Resource Development, Govt. of India aimed at improving the vocational skills and quality of life of the target group. The objective of the scheme is Educational Vocational and Occupational Development of Non-literates, Neo literates and persons having rudimentry level of education. The Shramik Vidyapeeth, Gaya (now renamed as Jan Shkshan Gaya) was established in August , 1995 under the aegis of the Bihar Educational Development Society, Gaya a Registered voluntary organisation under the Societies Registration Act 21, 1860 (Regn. No. 714/95-96) working in the field of vocational courses for socio-economic development of the deprived & weaker section of the target group of Gaya District. The Ministry of HRD, Got. of India Department of Education vide its letter no. F.5-39/93-D-III(AE) dated 24th July, 1995 accorded its sanction for establishment of Shramik Vidyapeeth, Gaya. It was inaugurated on 02.03.96 by Honâ€™ble Sri Pranab Mukherjee, then Union Minister of External Affairs & Deputy Chairman Planning Commission, Govt. of India. Our Special Achievement 1. Publication of Success Stories in the Publication of DAE, MHRD, Govt. of India 2. Organisation of Workshops, Seminars, Exhibition â€“ cum- sale Mela at Country, State and District level on important National and Social Ocassions under collaboration of Govt. Agencies as well as NGOs. 3. Vocational Training in different courses to the women prisoners of Cenrtral Jail, Gaya 4. Vocational Training Programme for the special target group of Army Service personnel and their wards. 5. JSS Production Centre for the Income Generation Programme for the Ex-an present beneficiaries of JSS, Gaya 6. JSS women helpline 7. Accredition from National Institute of Open Schooling, Govt. of India in eight different vocational courses for vocational training of the beneficiaries. 8. Organisation of Health Camp 9. Organisation of Lok Aadalat for Legal Awareness among Women and their empowerment. Our above mentioned out standing activities were observed by the officials of DAE , MHRD, Govt. of India, Social Workers Intellactual and Offic ials at State & district level positive observations made us capable to submit our candidature for the NLM UNESCO Award 2008. After going through the details of our programme and activities, the Govt. of India, Ministry of HRD recognised it as our outstanding contribution to the Adult Education Programme in Gaya District in the State of Bihar. And theirfore, Jan Shikshan Sansthan, Gaya had been awarded NLM UNESCO Award by the Honâ€™ble President of India Smt. Pratibhadevi Singh Patil in the year 2008 which was received by then Chairperson of JSS, Gaya Smt. Renuka Palit.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Jan Shikshan Sansthan is non-formal vocational educational institution for adults. By liking literacy with training. JSS seek to improve the quality of life of the beneficiaries. This institution after the introduction of the National Literacy Mission in 1988, almost the entire country has been covered by the literacy campaigns and now JSS is being set up in different districts in the country to consolidate the gains of the literacy campaigns and improve the quality of life through vocational training. The JSS now has the entire district as its area of operation and they hare expected to work as district level resource support agencies in organizing vocational training programmes for neo literates.

ngoList.sectorsWorkinIn: Education & Literacy
ngoList.title: Jan Shikshan Sansthan Vanchit Arwal
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: In arwal district unemployed male& female beneficiaries have educated by jan shikshan sansthan which is devoted as a pride. Jan sikshan sansthan is started from February 2004 It works all its five blocks from February to till financial year the total number of beneficiaries is 22927 Which is educated by so many instructor in different treads beneficiaries uproot its financial & family status in the society. Arwal district is one of the districts which is effected from local level terror(Naksal vad) so many number of unemployed & deprived people have move to involve in this way due to unemployment, big struggle between terror & local caste religion matter. It is very difficult to work in this condition . the jan shikshan sansthan have reached in rural areas & meet with the poor, deprived & unemployed people to uproot its social & economical status by skill development training program. Being of this tuff condition the jan shikshan sansthan have continue to work in this way, Now a days so many poor, unemployed and deprived people of this district is join with us and uproot its social and economical condition of its own family. So many beneficiaries have self depend, some people worked in factories and some are developed its own business. Most of the training program is Seduled for the female categories only due to most of female communities take training program and uproot its family economical status in the society. This step has taken by Jan Shikshan Sansthan as a mile stone in the field of women Empowerment. Besides of this by L.E.E (life Enrichment Education) the people educate poor and deprived women to uproot its social and Economical status in the society.The training program Ruined by Jan Shikshan Sansthan during the financial year following details. In financial year 2004-05 the total number of Beneficiaries1223, In year 2005-06 the total number of beneficiaries 1995, In year 2006-07 the total number of beneficiaries 1985, in year 2007-08 the total number of beneficiaries 2037, In year 2008-09 the total number of beneficiaries 2561, In year 2009-10 the total number of beneficiaries is 1225, In year 2010-11 the total number of beneficiaries is 1085, In year 2011-12 the total number of beneficiaries is 2561, In year 2012-13 the total number of beneficiaries is 2354, In year 2013-14 the total number of beneficiaries is 2509, In year 2014-15 the total number of beneficiaries is 1623, In year 2015-16 the total number of beneficiaries is 1769. Besides of all these training programme we have also organized some activities like Labour day, world Enviornment day, Yoga Day, Independence day, National literacy day, Swacchta Pakhwada and so many others which is given by the National literacy mission (NLM).

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Janani is registered in 1995. After this we are operating more than 31 clinics in Bihar, Jharkhand, UP and MP. In last twenty years we have performed more than five lakh sterlisations, three lakh thirty thousand medical and surgical abortions and one lakh seventy one thousand IUCD. Apart from this we are one of the major partner in the central Government social marketing programme of NRHM. We are distributing Condoms and OCP in seven states during last twenty one years.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Koshi Kshetriya Biklang, Bidhwa, Bridh Kalyan Samiti, Saharsa (Bihar) is established on 2nd October 1988 and registered under society registration act 1860 and also registered under the PWD act 1995 rule 52 . Organisation established by laborious handicapped koshi zone saharsa district in the state of Bihar. Our Organization working for handicapped , BPL Family and backward class and economically, educationally, vocationally challenged person and in the filled of rehabilitation. Organization has also get a National Awarded by honorable former president of India on the occasion of world disabled day in year 1993 to pursue the above objective. The organization is also running residential middle school. vocational training center, artificial limbs manufacturing. Our organization aims to make the disabled people self dependent and qualified is such a meaner that they can live life with dignity and respect and our main objective is to adjoin the people with the main stream of the country. Koshi Kshetriya Biklang, Bidhwa, Bridh Kalyan Samitee Saharsa is a Registered Societies Registration Act having Registration No. 226/90-91 Dated 05.09.1990 and F.C.R.A. No. - 03120008. The Organization Head Office at Saharsa and run by a Group of enthusiastic disabled youth for over all development of the Disabled. Organization was established in the year 1988 for the purpose of the disabled physically social, economically and educational Rehabilitation of the Disabled of Saharsa. The Organisation shall within the limits of its economic capacity and development, work effective provision for securing the right to work education and to public Assistance to case of unemployment old age, sickness and disablement, and in other eases of undeserved want in the handicapped fundamental Rights thats line life living in the best condition. Enactment of the "Person with Disabilities" [Equal opportunities, protection of Rights and full participation] act 1995 (jereom after the Pwd Act) which provides for education, employment. non-discrimination and social security for persons with Disabilities.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Awareness for Deaddiction programmes has been organised by so as a result of the campaigns thousands of persons left drinking and drugs. Krishna Ballabh Welfare Society initiated the deaddiction drive and organised mass awareness programmes so now the Bihar Government banned on liquor and issued the notification on banning the consumption, storage and sale of all types of liquor in Bihar. Krishna Ballabh Welfare Society has been norganising Environment awareness programmes. Cultural programmes are organising on special national event days. Health and family welfare programmes are regularly organising on various health issues including awareness against HIV Aids, Cancer awareness and treatment programmes, Blood Pressure and hepatitis B awareness and treatment programmes and other health related programmes are organising regularly in working area. Vocational Training programmes, rural development programmes and welfare of backward community programmes are result oriented programmes of Krishna Ballabh Welfare Society. Vocational Training Programmes have been organised for employment generation of youth. Old Age Day Home is established for old aged people of area.
